description.en: Find kth largest element in array.
description.zh-CN: [题目215] Find kth largest element in array....
description.zh-TW: [題目215] Find kth largest element in array....
description.ja: [問題215] Find kth largest element in array....
description.es: [Problema 215] Find kth largest element in array....
description.de: [Problem 215] Find kth largest element in array....
description.fr: [Problème 215] Find kth largest element in array....

explanation.en: APL solution for Kth Largest Element. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Kth Largest Element 的 APL 解决方案。使用等级 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回将对数组排序的索引。使用封闭 (⊂) 包装元素或展开 (⊃) 解包/提取。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Kth Largest Element 的 APL 解決方案。使用等級 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回將對陣列排序的索引。使用封閉 (⊂) 包裝元素或展開 (⊃) 解包/提取。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Kth Largest Element. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.es: APL solution for Kth Largest Element. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.

explanation.fr: APL solution for Kth Largest Element. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
